title: Tell me how I was supposed to win this game.
body:
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/146425921/201665539?tab=stats

S+ kat

Multiple legendaries.

All our objective kills were under my name.

Most wards on the team.

Most damage done.

Most damage healed (since i took hextech late so i could deal with the constant 1v5's)

Most kills.

Most cs.

Hell i even got close to most assists.

Least deaths.

etc etc.

basically the BEST player in that game.

But i still couldnt carry the fucking 4v5 from the nasus afking after feeding and the rest of my team being boosted to b5 from wood 7.

Go ahead, tell me what i couldve done better apart from just not queue.

replies.body: You can't win 'em all.
This

Except this is how a majority of my games go.

Granted not to this extreme but its the same general tune.

i get massive lead during laning phase, run around the map doing the work of 5 people using said lead.

team finds a way to throw the game, they ALWAYS manage to find a way i kid you not.

And i can garuantee you its because of matchmaking because if i join a premade, no issues we usually win.

And no these premades dont consist of people who can carry me, they consist of decent players who added me because "woah that was a really sick akali quadra wanna duo next game?" and i say yes because they weren't utter trash.

like shit theres a game a couple games after the one in the op.

Where i kid you not, i literally ward hopped into the enemy team and one shot a quadra, it wasn't double triple quadra.

it just went straight to quadra because all i did was e in and W in the middle of them.

I was that fed.

Take a guess weather or not we won that game, and take a guess as to what the state of my teams scores were and how well they cooperated together.
This.

> [{quoted}](name=YellowBrickRoad,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NIL3Wi1E,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-12T12:07:21.900+0000)
> 
> Go ahead, tell me what i couldve done better apart from just not queue.

Queue with other good players to make a 5 man team (use dynamic queue).

Yesterday, I played a 4v5 ARAM as Swain (we were the 4), carried hard, and we won easily. I got S grade, with top damage, most tanked (with low deaths) and most healed.

You win by being awesome, and with a bit of luck.
Dafuq is a nasus doing with ignite?
bronze.

First off sucks to have a team like that who just dc. 
Well I don't know whose on their team but if that have a bruiser than they just simply build AD/MR or AP/MR/HP to counter you if the game reaches into late game say about 40mins in or maybe a little earlier. Kat is very amazing to simply burst down their carry but because Kat has abilities to burst down champs, it can't work against tanks unless you have a good amount of magic penetration.
I would love to hear your opinion soon <3
Yep thats why i run mpen runes, and have a void scepter as a staple item in my build.
That is good, did they have anyone to counter your ult ? and where you the only one on your team who was fed?

No ult counters.

And yes only fed teammate, literally the only reason my team even had kills is because i roamed to their lane and killed their lane opponents for them.

pretty sure i had a what 70% kill participation that game and the rest of my team had numbers around 20%

Firstly from a master/challenger player perspective I first hand have a lot of experience with egos. You sir have a massive ego. If you tilt like crazy and bounce up in down in bronze that means you're a player who is _TILTING_ in bronze. Bronze league is the easiest to level of play. Next it seems you main Katarina. You do chalk up big kill scores, but that's what your champion is meant to do. You transition kills into more kills. Where as if you want to win you need to transition kills into objectives i.e. turret, inhib, baron, dragon. Therefore play another champion that does this more effectively, not Katarina. Realistically Silver 5 is the average rank of the player base know that. Secondly elo boosting exists because quote on quote good players that reside diamond and above can easily climb through low ranks bronze through to gold. Therefore if you were actually really good you can always climb. So basically recognise there is tonnes of skills you're bad at or don't understand. Blame yourself and no one else because only you have the power to improve your rank.

I main akali actually, ive been playing kat because in my eyes and experience she is literally the easiest champion in the game, on no other champions have i managed to get a quadra kill by pressing two buttons, and frankly ive been getting nowhere in bronze by playing mechanically challenging champs, so it was a breath of fresh air to be able to literally faceroll my keyboard and still get a quadra.

Ive had plenty of near pentas on akali but i did that through careful management of my energy and picking the order of my targets really well and disengaging mid kill on a target when a higher priority came up only to come back to them.

Your second point that i need to get objectives, shows that you did not read. at all.

I do do that, MOST TOWERS, MOST OBJECTIVES.

Those two points are where your entire argument fails.

Like fuck even on my main akali, there is a reason i build exactly 2 ad items every game regardless of my build, and one of them is always hydra, and its not because that increases my burst damage somehow, its because it gives me 50% spell vamp so i can duel with up to 3 people depending on my lead and hit towers for 1k an auto basically turning me into an extremely mobile nasus.

Your next point which is to play another champion that does things effectively, i have 2 mastery 7's and 5 mastery 6's and god knows how many more champs that id be mastery 6 or 7 on if i could be fucked to get them to mast 5 first, my champ pool is not one champion, its not even 3, its closer to 15? give or take, atleast 4-5 champs per role because alot of them can play multiple roles, trust me i have champions that can do these things, ive just been picking the champions that i consistently win on, rather than champions that require my team to do alot of the work in teamfights, because frankly, i dont trust my teams, they have proven time and time again that unless i get lucky in the game of team roulette i have to do everything for them.

Thirdly your point of "elo boosting exists" elo boosters are not silver players boosting people out of bronze, or i dunno diamond players boosting people to diamond.

They tend to be challenger players, or master tier, looking to make an extra buck of their skill since they have proven they can win in every league below their own.

Because thats the thing people like you dont understand "well im gold and i 1v9'd out of bronze why cant you" um, im not gold? im not meant to be gold. im nowhere near gold.

Silver maybe, but not gold lol.

That entire argument you made regarding that is a logical fallacy.

And finally just to push your argument into the dirt even more, if i can climb to a certain elo that means i belong there right?

So why arent i bronze 1, seeing i climbed there solo last season, and fucking stayed there.

Infact i almost escaped bronze, so ill leave you with that one question, either i somehow got worse, despite the fact that if you look at my performance averages this season compared to last im actually playing better, or bronze tilting me to b5.

Unless of course an influx of new players greatly affecting the mmr system couldve made it harder to climb, but thats bullshit right, like i mean solo players dont have trouble playing against 5 man premades right?

Thats not a thing.

Oh and yes, im a solo player, i reach b3 SOLO, then tilt to b5 SOLO.

When i am in a premade, seeing as i play consistently, and my teammates are consistent, guess what happens.

You wont believe this, but we win more than we lose, because it doesnt matter how tilted i am, the one thought in the back of my head is "Thank god im not playing solo atm because this team would be trash if i was"
Hi I'm Annie, I'm a P5 adc main looking for a high elo to learn from through spectating, can I add you ingame? :)

Set up your own custom team and just play ranked teams if you don't trust Lady Luck with your ques o.- or adapt faster? T_T http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/y3y9Hcgn-aram-team-serious-aram-players-only?comment=0009 I wish I had clones to play with so I could avoid matches where my team wont buy anti-hp items and the enemy side has like three champions that aren't supposed to be tanky, but are tanky because of our dmg in early to  mid game and beat us at the end like titans walking on mice (Great to see counter builds though, at long bloody last). http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/141850205/200193923?tab=overview I stopped checking items because we dominated most of the match and I didn't' notice none of my team had any/much anti-hp items until near the end X_ _ _X Uhhh do you play safe much(like be a mother chook guarding baby chickens)? Calls mias, nag people like a placid suggestive dodo when your not busy, and wait for your team to come up when you should? (it kinda helps if you share gold and xp, I'm not accusing you of solo roaming while your team's getting farmed!)

Eh i have a bit of a bad rep on the boards so all the respectable players would probs avoid me. (i bitch about bronze players and how stupid they are alot)

Tbh quite frankly i dont belong in b5, do i belong in bronze? possible but its definitely a matter of being in the wrong tier.

I could just point at all the games where my team doesnt play like ass and how hard i carried and say "see theres proof" but that doesnt really proove much, and either do averages because if my argument is that all bronze players tilt me because they lack skills that i expect people to know unless they bought their accounts at 30 and never played bots, then my averages being low but my outlier games where im "not tilted" having insane scores would only support my argument.

But instead ill point out the fact that im currently yo-yoing between b3 and b5 at an alarming rate.

im not talking im b3 one month and b5 the next, im talking in the morning when all the stoners and kids are online im b5 because im tilted as fuck by all the idiots.

then come around lunch time when the player base starts to mature im well into b4 and creeping towards b3 promos.

now assuming ive had a good nights sleep ill hit 90lp to b3 promos easily then tank right back down to b5 after around 3pm when all the kids come home from school.

This pattern shows that i have the skill to climb out of b5 (which is all the more impressive since im literally getting 13 lp a win in b4 and 15lp a win in b5, so we arent talking win 3 games at 26lp a win, oh no no no this is a real grind) but the immature, toxic, and just frankly ignorant and unskilled playerbase of the elo im in puts me in a terrible mood which affects my play.

Yeah.....just build to cope for them then and if you just happen to get 4 feeders any way just try to stay positive and always help til your spent before leaving fights.
maybe you should get fucking good lmao
Keep crying bronze
